5A1F4B4A.Line1.6D03F: It's a relic from when the world was young. For many years, an order of rogues called the Sisters of the Sightless Eye kept it safe.

8E083E4E.Line5.6D03F: Not sure how they lost hold of it, but I’ve heard the Sisters are not as strong as they once were.

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: Knowledge of their craft has spread to others, but most rogues you see these days are not true members of the order.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “Where did the Sightless Eye come from?”
